description.para: Specifies whether Samba should try to use Unicode on the wire by default. Note: This does NOT mean that samba will assume that the UNIX machine uses Unicode!

warning.para: If Unicode is disabled, certain clients (Win2k, WinXP) are known to crash during domain logons, and many other aspects of the protocol have major known issues. Microsoft does not produce a server that does not support Unicode, so probably never tests this combination.
